Key Match Events: Soumya Sarkar fell hard while attempting to save a boundary and hit an advertisement billboard, resulting in head injuries
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mustafizur Rahman left the field on a stretcher with cramps
Umpire Richard Kettleborough did not return to the field after the innings break due to the excessive heat
Others: Tanzid Hasan Tamim replaced Soumya Sarkar under concussion replacement rules
Jaker Ali Anik was hospitalised after a collision with Anamul Haque during a catch attempt in the final over
Janith Liyanage hit an unbeaten century for Sri Lanka
